name: Waldorf Chicken Salad Wrap Bento Box
author: fabeveryday
summary: The flavor of a Waldorf salad, but as a chicken salad wrap, separated into a bento box to keep it from getting soggy!
ingredients: ¾ cup chopped boneless chicken breast
¼ cup seedless red grapes, halved
1 pinch dried tarragon, or to taste
1 teaspoon chopped walnuts, or to taste
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Saute chicken in the hot oil until browned and no longer pink, about 8 minutes
Remove from heat and let cool, about 10 minutes
Stir cooled chicken, grapes, celery, and mayonnaise together in a bowl
Add tarragon and season with salt
Place chicken mixture into a compartment of a bento box
Roll or gently fold the tortilla and place into the largest section of the bento box
Place apple and walnuts in additional compartments
When ready to eat, spoon chicken mixture onto the tortilla, add the other toppings, and wrap
